named-query.name: Restaurant.findByNameQuery
named-query.query: from Restaurant where name like concat('%', :name, '%') and kitchen.id = :id

named-query.name: Restaurant.existsUser
named-query.query: select case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end from Restaurant re join re.users us where re.id = :restaurantId and us.id = :userId
